title: High Quality of Dispute Resolution Regulations
description: In 2024, Togo achieved a score of 94.59 in the World Bank's Dispute Resolution Pillar 1, indicating a robust regulatory framework for resolving disputes.

title: Strong Environmental Sustainability Policies
description: Togo received a rating of 4.5 out of 6 in 2023 for its policy and institutional framework supporting environmental sustainability, reflecting a commitment to ecological preservation.

title: Limited Social Safety Net Benefits for the Poorest
description: In 2021, only 2.99% of total social safety net benefits reached the poorest quintile, indicating a need for more equitable distribution of resources.

title: Low Female Representation in Tertiary Education Staff
description: As of 2021, only 6.1% of academic staff in tertiary education were female, highlighting gender disparity in higher education employment.

title: Insufficient Diarrhea Treatment Among Children
description: In 2017, only 13.6% of children under five received Oral Rehydration Salts (ORS) packets for diarrhea treatment, indicating a gap in healthcare provision.

title: Scarcity of R&D Technicians
description: With only 3.62 technicians per million people in 2018, Togo faces challenges in advancing research and development capabilities.
